p: In this study, we detected the inhibitory effects of GC376 on the PEDV 3CL pro. The antiviral effects of the inhibitor were studied using two PEDV strains, namely, CV777 and YN144. Finally, we determined the structure of the PEDV 3CL pro in complex with GC376 and compared this structure with other available 3CL pro structures. Our study provides a structural model for the development of anti-PEDV drugs and further enriches structural knowledge for the optimization of broad-spectrum anticoronavirus drugs.
